notes.text:
This update for python-requests fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-35195: Fixed cert verification regardless of changes to the value of `verify` (bsc#1224788).

notes.text: Requests is a HTTP library. Prior to 2.32.0, when making requests through a Requests `Session`, if the first request is made with `verify=False` to disable cert verification, all subsequent requests to the same host will continue to ignore cert verification regardless of changes to the value of `verify`. This behavior will continue for the lifecycle of the connection in the connection pool. This vulnerability is fixed in 2.32.0.
notes.title: CVE description
